title: API Gateway Custom Domain for Private API
description: Create a an API Gateway with custom domain support for private API.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK pattern implements the workaround solution described in the additional resources section.
API calls to the fully qualified name (FQDN), such as private.domain.com, are resolved by Route53 to a Network Load Balancer (NLB) and forwarded to the API Gateway.
